title: NEW CHATROOM ABOUT FONTS & TYPOGRAPHY
content:
Dear font lovers,   
   
hello I am TypeSmith and a German fontaddict,   
I never saw a fonts & typography chatroom so   
I decided to create one for discussion about   
font-design, typography and prepress stuff.   
   
Would be glad to see somebody there ;-)   
   
You can go to the room by using your browser   
via [http://www.freewebz.com/typesmith/chat.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803091113/http:/www.freewebz.com/typesmith/chat.html)  
or use an IRC client, host is "webmaster.ca.us.webchat.org",   
channel is "#fonts&typography".   
   
Greetings from Germany   
TypeSmith
author: anonymous
